programme.desc: 'S3/E12 of 13'. In the final episode of the season, 24-year-old Puseletso yearns for a connection with the father. She last saw him when she was five years old after he left one day, never to be seen again.

programme.title: Uthando Nes'thembu: Season 7, Episode 10
programme.desc: 'S7/E10 of 15'. Tired of being the bad guy, MaCele clarifies a few things with MaNgwabe about the promises that were made to her by Mseleku. MaKhumalo meets with MaNgwabe to try to mend their friendship.

programme.title: The Real Housewives Of Gqeberha: Season 1, Episode 8
programme.desc: 'S1/E8 of 14'. The Eastern Cape is rarely known for its incredible game lodges. Liz gets invited by an old friend to bring everyone for a night away in pure bush luxury at a nearby lodge.

programme.title: Marry Me Now SA: Season 2, Episode 8
programme.desc: 'S2/E8 of 10'. Kgahliso, a simple girl, proposes to her longtime boyfriend and the father of her kids. Will this change his privileged family's superiority complex when it comes to her?

programme.title: Iphupho Likabongi: Rating: 13, Drama, 2024
programme.desc: A comedian dreams of telling jokes and having a TV show. After overcoming hurdles and betrayal with a friend's help, she overcomes her fear of performing for an audience.

programme.title: The Wife: Season 3, Episode 31
programme.desc: 'S3/E31 of 60 - Kill A Leorpard For Naledi'. Love is in the air when Sefako sweeps Naledi off her feet, while Mqhele surprises Hlomu with a pair of diamond earrings.

programme.title: The Wife: Season 3, Episode 32
programme.desc: 'S3/E32 of 60 - Hlomu's Accident'. The Zulu brothers march on Royal Thabeng once again in search of diamonds and redemption. Meanwhile, Hlomu's drinking catches up with her and gets her into big trouble.

programme.title: The Wife: Season 3, Episode 33
programme.desc: 'S3/E33 of 60 - Royal Thabeng Is Sinking'. There's trouble in the Royal Thabeng as Kgosi has refused to heed a warning that has resulted in a tragedy. Meanwhile, Hlomu and Mthaniya are admitted to the hospital.

programme.title: WWE Smackdown!: Season 2, Episode 134
programme.desc: 'S2/E134 of 147'. A compelling blend of athleticism and entertainment is showcased on WWE SmackDown.

programme.desc: 'S3/E136 of 260'. Mazet wants the truth from Sonto, but can Sonto tell the whole truth? Miss Biyela succumbs to temptation. The past is too overwhelming for Mazet.

programme.title: The River: Season 3, Episode 196
programme.desc: 'S3/E196 of 260'. Tumi faces her toughest critics and Cobra is free but not from his ex.

programme.title: Lingashoni: Season 2, Episode 193
programme.desc: 'S2/E193 of 208'. Donald signs Robert's death warrant. There's a division in the Nondumo household.

programme.title: The Queen: Season 6, Episode 221
programme.desc: 'S6/E221 of 260 - Everything Has Changed'. Bhambatha wonders if he made the right call. Brutus makes a decision that shocks both his family and Harriet. Vuyiswa's return comes with an unexpected revelation for Georgina.

programme.title: Mzali Wam: Season 2, Episode 11
programme.desc: 'S2/E11 of 13'. Joyce returns home and her loved ones throw a party for her to celebrate her return. It is also at this party that Musa takes a huge leap and proposes to Ntokozo.

programme.title: Imboni Yama Tekisi: Season 1, Episode 7
programme.desc: 'S1/E7 of 13'. Ofentse's sisters become emotional about her love life, while Zakhele fails to come clean and ends up with wine on his face.

programme.title: Sibongile & The Dlaminis: Season 1, Episode 106
programme.desc: 'S1/E106 of 156'. A heartbroken Sibongile catches up with Wenzeni and discovers that the spark between Noma and Kwenzo has been reignited. Meanwhile, Khuzwayo is summoned to the head office in Durban.

programme.title: Date My Family: Season 10, Episode 28
programme.desc: 'S10/E28 of 35'. 27-year-old Karabo from Nigel is our bachelorette. An environmentalist and part-time model and presenter, Karabo is looking for a tall and dark man who's kind and considerate.

programme.title: The Wedding Dress: Rating: PG13, Drama, 2014
programme.desc: An uptight businesswoman is forced to reevaluate her life's priorities when her younger sister gets engaged.

programme.title: Kodwa Ma: Rating: 16, Drama, 2019
programme.desc: After Khanyi's fiancÃ© cheats on her, she becomes a closed off workaholic. Things change when her mother unexpectedly moves in with her and tries to get her back in the game.

programme.title: Iqhawe Lokuthula: Rating: 13, Drama, 2021
programme.desc: A young man is preparing for his wedding when his jealous ex-girlfriend uses her newly found witchcraft powers to bewitch him and his fiancÃ©e.

programme.title: The Certificate: Rating: 13, Drama, 2021
programme.desc: A street hustler must return home to bury his beloved sister but there's one problem: a dangerous loan shark is on his tail.

programme.title: The Contract: Rating: 13, Drama, 2014
programme.desc: A depressed man has put out a contract on himself, but when he suddenly rediscovers the will to live, he must find an exit clause before the killers get to him!

programme.title: The Boy Is Mine: Rating: PG13, Drama, 2014
programme.desc: A friendship is put to the test when two friends discover they are both dating the same man.

programme.title: Beng'shadelani: Rating: 13, Drama, 2022
programme.desc: Tumelo and his wife are a far cry from the affectionate and happy couple they used to be. After many years together, they can hardly stand being in the same room.

programme.title: One Coffin: Rating: 13, Drama, 2018
programme.desc: A funeral parlour owner is in desperate need of heart surgery. He decides to steal and re-use the coffin he buries his clients in to fund the procedure.

programme.title: Monate Mpolaye: Rating: 13, Drama, 2020
programme.desc: Iggy's friend convinces him to go partying. Things get out of hand, and they are robbed. Iggy needs to get the house in order before his pregnant wife comes home.

programme.title: Uthandiwe Uyatshata 2: Rating: 13, Drama, 2019
programme.desc: A princess is caught between following her heart and putting her family's interests before love. She embarks on a voyage of self-discovery.

programme.title: Uthando Lwethu: Rating: 13, Drama, 2018
programme.desc: A young woman diagnosed with vascular dementia has to convince her possessive, spiteful and jealous mother-in-law that she is worthy to be her son's wife.

programme.title: Ziyawa Kagogo: Rating: 13, Comedy, 2022
programme.desc: Two brothers are on the brink of homelessness and secretly plan an epic house party to raise funds and save their family home.

programme.title: Sofa Silahlane: Rating: 13, Drama, 2017
programme.desc: When a young man's pregnant girlfriend loses her life in a tragic accident he struggles to accept that his one true love is no more.

programme.title: Ntwana Yam: Rating: 13, Drama, 2016
programme.desc: When five friends come into possession of a gang's loot, they think they've hit the jackpot, only to find themselves staring down a road of tragedy.

programme.title: Isitulo: Rating: 16, Drama, 2016
programme.desc: A widow stands up to a conservative church community to defend her rights. Rejected and humiliated, she decides to expose their discrimination against widows.

programme.title: Umfelokazi 2: Rating: 13, Drama, 2017
programme.desc: After being punished for killing her husband, a young woman tries to re-enter civilian life as quietly as possible, that's until her hunger for revenge is triggered.

programme.title: Motho Waka: Rating: 13, Drama, 2021
programme.desc: A controlling maid of honour has to plan her best friend's wedding with an easy going best man. The only hiccup: the best man is the same guy she once abandoned on a date.

programme.title: Umzi Watsha: Rating: 13, Drama, 2021
programme.desc: Lwando and his wife have been married for a few years. Their perfect lives are turned upside down when Lwando's estranged daughter arrives.

programme.title: Ubabazala: Rating: 13, Drama, 2022
programme.desc: When Sipho finally decides to do the right thing by his baby mama and marry her, he has to deal with her overprotective father who is well aware of their troubled relationship.

programme.title: Ke Bona Lerato: Rating: 13, Drama, 2022
programme.desc: A man who works at a funeral parlour sees the same girl at every funeral he goes to. In his quest to find out who she is, he embarks on a heart-warming journey of love.

programme.title: Oksalayo Ngiyashisa: Rating: 13, Drama, 2022
programme.desc: A desperate student finds a drug dealer's money after losing her bursary. She spends the money, but then the drug dealer gives her two options: she either pays him back or becomes a mule.

programme.title: Nkosathana: Rating: PG13, Drama, 2017
programme.desc: A nerdy student finds out his girlfriend has been crowned queen of a rural clan. To keep her, he has to go through the gruelling process of becoming a warrior clansman.

programme.title: Ndabazabantu: Rating: 13, Drama, 2017
programme.desc: A young couple is about to walk down the aisle, but on the morning of their wedding skeletons from their pasts threaten to keep them apart.

programme.title: A Lifetime Of Tears: Rating: PG, Drama, 2013
programme.desc: A man whose wife died tragically meets a woman who helps him heal by working through the pain. He falls for her, but there is a secret that could destroy their love.

programme.title: iFipempula: Season 1, Episode 28
programme.desc: 'S1/E28'. Nelson rescues Mwansa who opens up to Lusungu about Sharon's chekered past. Norah learns of Mr. Zimba's inadequacies and Aunty B finds the reason behind all her problems.

programme.title: Shi Mumbi: Season 4, Episode 9
programme.desc: 'S4/E9'. With Bana Mumbi gone, Belinda finally becomes the boss lady of the house, she takes over running of the phone charging business. Shi Mumbi goes to look for money to also travel to kapiri.

programme.title: Mwinemushi: Season 2, Episode 9
programme.desc: 'S2/E9'. Polopela, their son inlaw has turned their daughter into a punching bag they tell Mwinemushi. The cause of her latest beating? why has the kitchen knife gone missing!!!

programme.title: My Kitchen Party: Season 1, Episode 4
programme.desc: 'S1/E4'. A reality television show that narrates a bride's story capturing her experience through an authentically rich Zambian traditional bridal shower.

programme.title: Date My Family Zambia: Season 2, Episode 6
programme.desc: 'S2/E6'. Date My Family helps singletons find love by sending them on dates with their potential partner's family. Can you really trust your family to help you find love?

programme.title: City On Fire: Season 2, Episode 1
programme.desc: 'S2/E1 of 48'. The dumping of another dead body in the outskirts of the city, awakens the police. They search for the murderer. It is believed the killer targets only taxi drivers.

programme.title: Zed Top Ten: Season 1, Episode 2
programme.desc: 'S1/E2'. ZED Top Ten is a weekly 13 part music series that countdowns Zambia's top ten music videos. Viewers participate by choosing their weekly favourites online.

programme.title: Afro Pops: Season 1, Episode 34
programme.desc: 'S1/E34'. Afro-Pops showcases the best rhythms and drum beats from Africa. Enjoy the latest and greatest hits across the continent.

programme.title: Mwinemushi: Season 2, Episode 8
programme.desc: 'S2/E8'. Pezulu and his wife decide to take back their daughter from what they regard to be a loveless and abusive marriage.

programme.title: The Security Guard: Season 6, Episode 13
programme.desc: 'S6/E13 of 26'. Life is chaotic at Tizadyanabo Security. The employees hold the power and their decisions determine the success or failure of the company.

programme.title: The Aubrey And BJ Show: Season 1, Episode 13
programme.desc: 'S1/E13 of 26'. Aubrey Luo & BJ star in this 24-minute sketch comedy series, leaving no stone unturned- whether satirizing local Parliamentarians or judges or pastors - in their search for laughs.

programme.title: Amooye: Season 1, Episode 1
programme.desc: 'S1/E1'. Kabwe proposes to Noni but he is in love with another woman. Muta finds out she is pregnant and it maybe her husbands or her boyfriend's baby.

programme.desc: 'S3/E137'. Thathi and Pretty get Mazet curious about MaMbhele's words. Sizwe enlists Ntokozo to help Zaza. Pretty learns there's high expectations for her new performances.

programme.title: The River: Season 3, Episode 197
programme.desc: 'S3/E197'. Enemy lines are drawn between the Dlomos and the Dikanas. Cobra is hit with a curveball after trying to do the right thing.

programme.title: Lingashoni: Season 2, Episode 194
programme.desc: 'S2/E194'. Alakhe's kidnapping has the Nondumos at each others' throats. Mantoa catches Mandla and Puleng sneaking out of Seipati's house.

programme.title: The Queen: Season 6, Episode 222
programme.desc: 'S6/E222 - Peace Reigns'. Peace finally reigns between the Sebatas and Khozas. Georgina bursts Vuyiswa's bubble.

programme.title: Uzulu Nomhlaba: Season 1, Episode 10
programme.desc: 'S1/E10'. Zulu struggles to deal with the new revelation in his life. Mfecane calls a sangoma to rid him of his nightmares. Zulu and Hlengiwe are involved in an accident.

programme.title: Big Brother Mzansi: Season 4, Episode 31
programme.desc: 'S4/E31'. As the housemates continue to get to know each other, new layers are revealed. Strategies are also under review, as tensions continue to rise.

programme.title: Sibongile & The Dlaminis: Season 1, Episode 107
programme.desc: 'S1/E107'. Worry and disappointment haunt Khuzwayo when he finds out the real reason he was summoned to Durban. Guilt overcomes Sibongile when she realises the damage she caused.

programme.title: Something About Busi: Rating: PG13, Romantic Comedy, 2014
programme.desc: A romantic comedy about three men who are after one woman. While staying at a B&B in Soweto, they all compete for the affections of the irresistible owner, Busi.

programme.title: Sofa Silahlane: Rating: 13, Drama, 2017
programme.desc: When a young man's pregnant girlfriend loses her life in a tragic accident he struggles to accept that his one true love is no more.

programme.title: Ntwana Yam: Rating: 13, Drama, 2016
programme.desc: When five friends come into possession of a gang's loot, they think they've hit the jackpot, only to find themselves staring down a road of tragedy.

programme.title: Be Mine: Rating: PG, Drama, 2012
programme.desc: A teenager nearly loses the girl of his dreams after he records videos of her and uploads them on the web in an attempt to win her heart.

programme.title: Lokshin Bioskop: Uyaphapha: Season 1, Episode 1
programme.desc: 'S1/E1 - Plan A'. A trio of amateur burglars undergoes intensive physical, emotional and mental exercises in their preparation to stage the biggest burglary at a popular tavern.

programme.title: A Lifetime Of Tears: Rating: PG, Drama, 2013
programme.desc: A man whose wife died tragically meets a woman who helps him heal by working through the pain. He falls for her, but there is a secret that could destroy their love.

programme.title: Kuyafiwa Ezulwini: Rating: 13, Drama, 2020
programme.desc: A lady wins the lottery. On her way to tell her husband, she is hit by a car and dies on the spot. When she arrives at Heavenly Affairs, she is in denial about her death.

programme.title: Umlingisi: Rating: 16, Drama, 2020
programme.desc: A boy battles between choosing a career in comedy or pleasing his parents by becoming a medical doctor.

programme.title: Sawubona We Lova: Rating: 16, Drama, 2020
programme.desc: An ex gambling, orphaned and self destructive man decides to clean up his act and goes on a journey to find his biological father, but he finds more than he bargained for.

programme.title: Abogogo Be Stokvel: Rating: 13, Drama, 2020
programme.desc: Two elderly ladies get thrown out of a stokvel they started years ago. They are determined to take their revenge, despite old age posing a challenge.

programme.title: Kuyafiwa Eshogweni: Rating: 13, Drama, 2021
programme.desc: When a pathological troublemaker is rejected from heaven and hell, he escapes Heavenly Affairs to avenge his death by haunting a sloppy assassin who killed him by mistake.

programme.title: Lunameva: Rating: 13, Drama, 2021
programme.desc: A married couple, Nomaza and Gabriel, serve as marriage counsellors in their church until their former nanny shows up with a baby in her arms, claiming it's Gabriel's.

programme.title: iJackpot: Rating: 13, Drama, 2017
programme.desc: When a beautiful young woman discovers that her workplace is a front for illegal dealings, she enlists the help of her boyfriend and others to rob the place.

programme.title: Paleho: Rating: 13, Drama, 2017
programme.desc: A father marries his second daughter off for money. His eldest daughter, disappointed by her father's actions, goes against all odds to free her little sister.

programme.title: Nomalanga: Rating: PG13, Drama, 2017
programme.desc: A teenager embarks on a quest to find her biological mother after she discovers that she was kidnapped.

programme.title: Thando Lwami: Rating: 13, Drama, 2017
programme.desc: When a young man falls for a wealthy woman, their love is tested as their families come against their union. Will their love crumble under the weight of the condemnation?

programme.title: Umhlukanisi: Rating: 13, Drama, 2021
programme.desc: After seven years of marriage, a domestic worker finds herself falling in love with her boss. Her husband finds out and manipulates her to rob the family she works for.

programme.title: O Nyala Neng: Rating: 13, Drama, 2021
programme.desc: With her long-term relationship showing no signs of a serious commitment, Masego starts feeling envious when her friend gets married.

programme.title: Ke Bona Spoko: Rating: 13, Drama, 2022
programme.desc: When hard-working and loyal Bokang finally strikes it rich, a girlfriend he thought was dead comes crawling out of the woodwork and is hell-bent on getting him back.

programme.title: Thandanani: Rating: 13, Drama, 2022
programme.desc: On the verge of losing his book contract, Thandanani must complete his romance novel while suffering from writer's block. He goes on a dating spree to get inspiration for his new book.

programme.title: Vilakazi Supermarket: Rating: 13, Drama, 2022
programme.desc: A father's passing forces the paths of an estranged mother and son to cross again after receiving equal inheritance from the late father's will.

programme.title: Leeto La Tekesi: Hape Hape Part 1: Rating: 13, Comedy, 2017
programme.desc: A taxi driver and his gullible friend find themselves in a sticky situation after mistakenly getting mixed up with a dangerous gang.

programme.title: Ukuqonywa: Rating: 13, Drama, 2017
programme.desc: A young man faces the difficulties of being a single parent after losing his wife in a car accident.

programme.title: After Tears: Rating: PG13, Drama, 2014
programme.desc: A pastor with a dark past is happy with his life, serving his community and fulfilling his purpose. However, his past comes back to haunt him.

programme.desc: 'S11/E18'. Abram was in love when he first saw Nomvuyo in a church choir. They have been together for 14 years, and they have had their ups and downs. Now they are ready to say I DO.

programme.title: Something About Busi: Rating: PG13, Romantic Comedy, 2014
programme.desc: A romantic comedy about three men who are after one woman. While staying at a B&B in Soweto, they all compete for the affections of the irresistible owner, Busi.

programme.title: Ukukhanya: Rating: 13, Drama, 2016
programme.desc: A dedicated priest uproots his family from his hometown to embark on a mission to spread the word. His mission, however, puts excessive pressure on his family.

programme.title: The Radebes Part 1: Rating: 13, Drama, 2017
programme.desc: Starring Sonia Mbele, this drama sees a long-buried family secret explode at a family reunion, leaving everyone with nothing else to do but pick up the pieces.

programme.title: Lokshin Bioskop: Damascus: Rating: 16, Drama, 2014
programme.desc: A man seeks redemption for all the crimes he has committed. He also hopes to win back the love of his life. However, will she and the community accept that he is a changed man?

programme.title: Lokshin Bioskop: Uyaphapha: Season 1, Episode 3
programme.desc: 'S1/E3 - Plan C'. Bongi convinces Guavs to end his friendship with Lizwi. Lizwi sets out to find a replacement for his former best friend. Meanwhile, Guavs has also found a new best man for his wedding.

programme.title: An Honest Living: Rating: PG13, Drama, 2013
programme.desc: A man wants to keep a promise to his son. When he meets a woman who could make this possible, he's thrilled. Then she reveals what she wants in return.

programme.title: Umshado Kadadewethu: Rating: 13, Drama, 2020
programme.desc: Ayanda thought she had it all, a thriving career and the number one spot on the 30 under 30 list. Until her baby sister's wedding exposes the fact that she doesn't have it all.

programme.title: Umsasazi: Rating: 13, Drama, 2020
programme.desc: Two women's lives are brought together by death and an uncomfortable family secret. When they discover that they share a passion for radio, they go on a journey of healing and forgiveness.

programme.title: Bo Chomie: Rating: 13, Romance, 2020
programme.desc: Omphile fakes her identity on social media to find love. She ends up finding love with the right person, but how long will she continue living a lie?

programme.title: Take Me Home Again: Rating: 13, Thriller, 2020
programme.desc: A young man just found himself a girlfriend. Just when he thinks life is about to be cozy for him, he encounters the angry spirit of a dead man who was transported home for a burial.

programme.title: Umlaleli: Rating: 13, Drama, 2021
programme.desc: Tumelo Serero falls in love with a radio DJ, Lady Pru, after hearing her voice on radio. He goes on a journey to confess his undying love to her.

programme.title: Ispaza Sasekhaya: Rating: 13, Drama, 2021
programme.desc: Fats, the unpopular kid at school, decides to host the biggest party his township has ever seen - all to impress the new girl he has a crush on.

programme.title: Umona Awunamvuzo: Rating: PG13, Comedy, 2016
programme.desc: When a woman who's always put her career first meets a potential life partner, she suddenly has to choose between her career and love.

programme.title: Owami Nami: Rating: 13, Fantasy Drama, 2016
programme.desc: An insecure young woman turns to muti to stop her boyfriend from pursuing another woman, but she gets more than what she bargained for.

programme.title: Umdlwembe: Rating: 16, Drama, 2016
programme.desc: An ambitious young woman is caught up in a world of greed and temptation as she pursues a career as a dancer. Will she learn the lessons before it's too late?

programme.title: Tango: Rating: 13, Drama, 2016
programme.desc: A talented dancer dreams of making it big, but his new dancing partner has other ideas.

programme.title: Mabena Security: Rating: 13, Drama, 2021
programme.desc: After beating up and arresting an undercover police officer, Thabang is dismissed from his job as a detective. He is then forced to take a job at a security company.

programme.title: Istina: Rating: 13, Drama, 2021
programme.desc: When Kanana's boyfriend proposes to her, she is over the moon. But then her boyfriend tells her that he wants his female friend to be his best man.

programme.title: Beng'shadelani: Rating: 13, Drama, 2022
programme.desc: Tumelo and his wife are a far cry from the affectionate and happy couple they used to be. After many years together, they can hardly stand being in the same room.

programme.title: Umndeni Empini: Rating: 13, Drama, 2022
programme.desc: When a father with cancer has a couple of weeks to live, two brothers fight for the title of sole heir to his company, but their greed gets in the way.

programme.title: Umshado Wethu: Rating: 13, Drama, 2021
programme.desc: A well-off woman finally weds the man of her dreams, but her parents refuse for her to proceed with the wedding because they want her to marry a trust fund baby.

programme.title: Leeto La Tekesi: Hape Hape Part 3: Rating: 13, Comedy, 2017
programme.desc: With their jobs on the line, Masello and Mkhize are determined to solve the heist case and put the culprits behind bars for good.

programme.title: Umfelokazi: Rating: 13, Drama, 2016
programme.desc: A man's business is in a terrible state when a stranger convinces the wife into killing her husband so they can share his investment. Will she do it?

programme.title: Lokshin Bioskop: Battle Of House: Rating: PG13, Comedy, 2013
programme.desc: Two half-brothers are fighting over their late father's house. How far will they go to get what they want?

programme.desc: Gang leader, Mbukeni Zulu, finds himself falling in love with his mentor's arch enemy's daughter. He must now choose between the gang and his new love.

programme.title: Mim: Dipoloko: Rating: 13, Drama, 2018
programme.desc: When a polygamous family man dies, his son finds himself between two feuding mothers.

programme.title: Iqiniso Lam: Rating: 13, Drama, 2020
programme.desc: Zinhle lies about being an accountant and fakes a wealthy and successful life in order to impress everyone. One of her friends finds out and decides to expose her.

programme.title: Indlela Zimbili: Rating: 13, Drama, 2020
programme.desc: Zandile and Mmathabo have both lost their sons in different ways. Zandile feels that her situation is worse because Mmathabo can still talk to her son.

programme.title: Naphtal: Rating: 13, Drama, 2021
programme.desc: An aspiring filmmaker defies his loan shark mother's wishes in pursuit of his own dreams.

programme.title: Ukholo: Rating: 13, Drama, 2017
programme.desc: After being dumped by his wife on their anniversary, a decent man becomes depressed, until a kind voice nurses his faith back to life.

programme.title: Uthando Lwababili: Rating: 13, Drama, 2017
programme.desc: A young man is caught between his family and his opinionated girlfriend. Is he going to choose the woman of his dreams or stick to what his family wants for him?

programme.title: Mapetla: Rating: 13, Drama, 2017
programme.desc: Three girls find themselves faced with the hardship of township life. It seems their only way out of this life is through promiscuity.

programme.title: Isitha: Rating: 13, Drama, 2016
programme.desc: An assassin is given a mission to take out his boss's enemy, but when he falls in love with the target, his boss decides it's time he's taught a lesson.

programme.title: Shukuma: Rating: PG13, Drama, 2021
programme.desc: A star dancer is kicked off a dance team before a life changing competition. She must prove, against all odds, that she too deserves a fair chance despite her poor background.

programme.title: Bonus: Rating: 13, Comedy, 2022
programme.desc: It's the festive season and a young man battling with alcoholism is spending his December bonus recklessly.

programme.title: Ziyawa Kagogo: Rating: 13, Comedy, 2022
programme.desc: Two brothers are on the brink of homelessness and secretly plan an epic house party to raise funds and save their family home.

programme.title: Impikiswano: Rating: 13, Comedy, 2022
programme.desc: Zolani, an intelligent high school student who believes he's the smartest person in the room, has his life turned upside down when his twin sister, Samu, decides to play matchmaker.

programme.title: Rivoningo: Rating: 13, Drama, 2022
programme.desc: A smart and obedient girl dreams of studying engineering. Her dream is cut short when her family offers her as a wife to culturally reunite two families.

programme.title: Umhlanga: Rating: 13, Drama, 2018
programme.desc: A young girl and dedicated policeman go on a frantic search for her sister after she disappeared during the annual reed dance.

programme.title: Umfelokazi 2: Rating: 13, Drama, 2017
programme.desc: After being punished for killing her husband, a young woman tries to re-enter civilian life as quietly as possible, that's until her hunger for revenge is triggered.

programme.title: Ben 9: Rating: 13, Drama, 2013
programme.desc: A struggling young man receives a lump sum of money from the bank. He goes on a spending spree - but then his anonymous benefactor arrives with a nasty surprise.

programme.title: The River: Season 3, Episode 199
programme.desc: 'S3/E199 - White Flag'. Cobra has his hands full with baby mama drama while the Dikanas and the Dlomos are at loggerheads.

programme.title: Sibongile & The Dlaminis: Season 1, Episode 108

programme.title: Lingashoni: Season 2, Episode 193

programme.desc: 'S1/E106'. A heartbroken Sibongile catches up with Wenzeni and discovers that the spark between Noma and Kwenzo has been reignited. Meanwhile, Khuzwayo is summoned to the head office in Durban.

programme.title: Sibongile & The Dlaminis: Season 1, Episode 107
programme.desc: 'S1/E107'. Worry and disappointment haunt Khuzwayo when he finds out the real reason he was summoned to Durban. Guilt overcomes Sibongile when she realises the damage she caused.

programme.title: Sibongile & The Dlaminis: Season 1, Episode 108
programme.desc: 'S1/E108'. It appears that Gcina has gotten herself a spy in the house. Meanwhile, a drunk Njengaye tells Nomfundo that he plans to leave Phetheni. Kwenzo is left even more confused when Nomalanga kisses him.

programme.title: Sengkhathele: Season 4, Episode 2
programme.desc: 'S4/E2'. Nandipha feels unsafe and constantly on edge. She wrote to the show because she needs help ending things with her abusive boyfriend, Somnandi.

programme.title: Lingashoni: Season 2, Episode 192
programme.desc: 'S2/E192'. Robert receives a life-threatening ultimatum to save Alakhe's life. Puleng wants to continue the secret affair with Mandla, but Mandla is non-committal.

programme.title: Lingashoni: Season 2, Episode 193
programme.desc: 'S2/E193'. Donald signs Robert's death warrant. There's a division in the Nondumo household.

programme.title: Lingashoni: Season 2, Episode 194
programme.desc: 'S2/E194'. Alakhe's kidnapping has the Nondumos at each others' throats. Mantoa catches Mandla and Puleng sneaking out of Seipati's house.

programme.title: Lingashoni: Season 2, Episode 195
programme.desc: 'S2/E195'. Time is running out for Robert when they get a video of Alakhe, and Mantoa is determined to get something from Mandla for her silence.

programme.title: Lingashoni: Season 2, Episode 196
programme.desc: 'S2/E196'. Robert goes live on national TV, prepared to take his life. Mandla has to bow down to Mantoa's demands so that she can keep his secrets.

programme.title: The Queen: Season 6, Episode 221
programme.desc: 'S6/E221 - Everything Has Changed'. Bhambatha wonders if he made the right call. Brutus makes a decision that shocks both his family and Harriet. Vuyiswa's return comes with an unexpected revelation for Georgina.

programme.title: The Queen: Season 6, Episode 222
programme.desc: 'S6/E222 - Peace Reigns'. Peace finally reigns between the Sebatas and Khozas. Georgina bursts Vuyiswa's bubble.

programme.title: The Queen: Season 6, Episode 223
programme.desc: 'S6/E223 - Family Matters'. Antoinette is not happy when she discovers something private about Dorcas. Vuyiswa realizes she can't just ignore the fact that Hector is the father of her child.

programme.title: The Queen: Season 6, Episode 224
programme.desc: 'S6/E224 - Making Amends'. Hector tries to make amends with Vuyiswa. Dorcas and Antoinette find themselves butting heads. Everyone is worried as Nkosiyabo goes awol.

programme.title: The Queen: Season 6, Episode 225
programme.desc: 'S6/E225 - Beat Downs And Baby Trouble'. Vuyiswa gets a threatening visit. Brutus is at odds with his sons over favouring Nkosiyabo.

programme.title: Imboni Yama Tekisi: Season 1, Episode 8
programme.desc: 'S1/E8'. Nthabiseng makes a difficult decision and fails to give one of her daughters the affirmation she seeks. Sabelo's mother handles his business.

programme.title: News On Wethu: Season 2, Episode 40
programme.desc: 'S2/E40'. The daily news bulletin covering the latest breaking news locally and internationally. Presented in IsiZulu and IsiXhosa, we bring you a new era of current and reliable news coverage.

programme.title: Mnakwethu Happily Ever After?: Season 3, Episode 8
programme.desc: 'S3/E8'. Thulani and Temogo cook dinner together and discuss Caroline. MaMchunu and Samantha have a chat with Juba. Mphahlele has a heart-to-heart with his sons.

programme.title: Ezomshado: Season 2, Episode 13
programme.desc: 'S2/E13'. William and Shadi have been separated for years but still share the same yard. William wants a second chance at marriage with his wife, but she wants nothing to do with him. Can Shadi find it in her heart to forgive him?

programme.title: Our Perfect Wedding: Season 11, Episode 19
programme.desc: 'S11/E19'. Pheeha met Busi at a shopping center. Busi gave Pheela her name and surname but not her number. He looked her up on social media, and found her and the rest is history.

programme.title: Umtshakazi Usebharini: Rating: 13, Drama, 2022
programme.desc: A runaway bride is helped by strangers in a tavern to come to terms with her feelings about her wedding and her husband-to-be.

programme.title: The River: Season 3, Episode 196
programme.desc: 'S3/E196'. Tumi faces her toughest critics and Cobra is free but not from his ex.

programme.title: The River: Season 3, Episode 197
programme.desc: 'S3/E197'. Enemy lines are drawn between the Dlomos and the Dikanas. Cobra is hit with a curveball after trying to do the right thing.

programme.title: The River: Season 3, Episode 198
programme.desc: 'S3/E198 - A Sting In The Tail'. Lindiwe hits the Dlomos where it hurts, while Cobra's plan to gain access to his son worries Dimpho and Kedibone.

programme.title: Mma Moriri 2: Rating: 13, Comedy, 2016
programme.desc: A new hairstylist competition is announced by a well known brand with a huge prize to be won, with only one condition - the competition is only open to women hairstylists

programme.title: Mkhulu: Rating: PG, Drama, 2015
programme.desc: A cheese-girl goes to visit her strict grandfather during school holidays. Their relationship is shaky at first, but here she finally discovers the true meaning of family.

programme.title: Truck Drivers: Rating: 16, Drama, 2015
programme.desc: This film explores a family bond burdened by unmet expectations and how it finally reaches breaking point due to a conflicting love interest.

programme.title: Ungeno: Rating: 13, Drama, 2015
programme.desc: After her husband dies, a woman is forced to marry one of her in-laws according to the Zulu tradition. A bitter fight then ensues for her late husband's estate.

programme.title: Uncle Malume: Rating: 13, Comedy, 2014
programme.desc: A young man is under pressure to get married. He looks for a wife in church services and brothels and he realises that finding a wife is easier said than done.

programme.title: Bade Lam: Rating: 13, Drama, 2022
programme.desc: A friendship of many years is suddenly tested when Bongani discovers that his best friend, Sipho, secretly has a child with his little sister.

programme.title: Lerato Weh: Rating: 13, Drama, 2022
programme.desc: Lerato feels out of place with her new family, but when a house party gets out of hand, she must work with her new siblings to avoid disaster.

programme.title: Bekezela: Rating: 13, Drama, 2022
programme.desc: Nambitha and Themba Mpama have been happily married for 13 years. However, their marriage is no longer the same due to infidelity.

programme.title: Sugar Mama: Rating: 13, Drama, 2022
programme.desc: A boy dates a beautiful girl but is insecure as she makes more money than him. He entertains an older lady who keeps giving him money. He uses her money to spoil his girlfriend.

programme.title: Ilanga Lami Lele: Rating: 16, Drama, 2022
programme.desc: Two sisters find their relationship tested when their family splits when they want to marry on the same day. Conflicts arise during the planning, and it's all a mess.

programme.title: Ugogo Wabantu: Rating: 13, Comedy, 2022
programme.desc: When an elderly woman is diagnosed with cancer, she decides to let go of her fear and chase her childhood dream of becoming a singer.

programme.title: Perfect Lobola: Rating: 13, Drama, 2020
programme.desc: On the eve of his lobola negotiations, Phesheya doesn't have the money. The pressure mounts to come up with something.

programme.title: Ubabazala: Rating: 13, Drama, 2022
programme.desc: When Sipho finally decides to do the right thing by his baby mama and marry her, he has to deal with her overprotective father who is well aware of their troubled relationship.

programme.title: Ke Bona Spoko: Rating: 13, Drama, 2022
programme.desc: When hard-working and loyal Bokang finally strikes it rich, a girlfriend he thought was dead comes crawling out of the woodwork and is hell-bent on getting him back.

programme.title: Mngani Wam: Rating: 13, Romance, 2022
programme.desc: After sharing a passionate kiss, long-time friends Mandisa and Kabelo decide to set each other up with their friends, only to realise that they are in love with each other.

programme.title: Beng'shadelani: Rating: 13, Drama, 2022
programme.desc: Tumelo and his wife are a far cry from the affectionate and happy couple they used to be. After many years together, they can hardly stand being in the same room.

programme.title: Ziyawa Kagogo: Rating: 13, Comedy, 2022
programme.desc: Two brothers are on the brink of homelessness and secretly plan an epic house party to raise funds and save their family home.

programme.title: Grade 13: Rating: 13, Drama, 2021
programme.desc: A graduate sees an opportunity to open an abet school in the village, but turns out that her idea is challenged as she gets the most thick headed adults as her students.

programme.title: Bokamoso: Rating: 13, Drama, 2024
programme.desc: Bokamoso and Papi discovered some lab chemicals in Bokamoso's father's lab garage, and the chemicals led them to have supernatural powers.

programme.title: Welcome To The Family: Rating: 13, Drama, 2021
programme.desc: At the point of getting engaged, life is turned upside down for Lerato and Vusi when his two mothers manipulate them into coming to his home in KZN.

programme.title: Nomandla: Rating: 16, Biography, 2017
programme.desc: What does it take to say enough is enough? A young woman faces this dilemma as she finds herself in a dangerous relationship with a man who's not who he said he was.

programme.title: Tango: Rating: 13, Drama, 2016
programme.desc: A talented dancer dreams of making it big, but his new dancing partner has other ideas.

programme.title: Ezibiweyo: Rating: 13, Drama, 2017
programme.desc: A young man is kidnapped and taken to an illegal circumcision school. Together with his fellow initiates, they must fight their way to freedom.

programme.desc: 'S4/E34'. As the housemates continue to get to know each other, new layers are revealed. Strategies are also under review, as tensions continue to rise.

programme.title: Ilifa: Rating: 13, Drama, 2017
programme.desc: Once successful and very close, two siblings find themselves fighting for their parents' riches after they pass away suddenly.

programme.title: Indumbe: Rating: 13, Drama, 2017
programme.desc: A hardworking woman is thriving in both her personal and work life. However, she's forced to re-evaluate her life when she loses everything.

programme.title: Fong Kong Pastor: Rating: 13, Drama, 2015

programme.desc: 'S1/E1 - Blood Money'. Bongi is in a relationship with a married man, whose wife puts out a hit on her. The hitman is Bongi's younger brother who had been in prison. He and Bongi defraud the man's wife.

programme.title: Lokshin Bioskop: Bring Aya Home: Rating: PG13, Drama, 2013
programme.desc: A young father discovers that his young daughter is sick. After failing to find a cure, he decides to consult traditional doctors.

programme.title: Bafana Ba Bruno: Rating: 13, Drama, 2021
programme.desc: Two brothers have to completely change their lifestyles in order to obtain their late father's inheritance.

programme.title: Mzamo: Rating: 13, Drama, 2020
programme.desc: During the coronavirus lockdown, two best friends find themselves at the risk of being caught while cheating on their wives.

programme.title: Isizungu: Rating: 13, Drama, 2022
programme.desc: A widow travels to visit her daughter for a week to get a breather and spend time with her. She never thought that her age love would come knocking on her door.

programme.title: Moshimane: Rating: 13, Drama, 2022
programme.desc: After dating for a year, Moshimane knows he wants to spend the rest of his life with Lulu, but confessing his undying love and intentions to her on their anniversary day turns ugly.

programme.title: Istina: Rating: 13, Drama, 2021
programme.desc: When Kanana's boyfriend proposes to her, she is over the moon. But then her boyfriend tells her that he wants his female friend to be his best man.

programme.title: Ziright Igirls: Rating: 13, Drama, 2022
programme.desc: Four first-year varsity girls have their craziest night out. When one of them goes missing, the trio must find her before their exam the next morning.

programme.title: Inkinga Uben: Rating: 13, Drama, 2017
programme.desc: What began as a mission to stop her husband's wandering eye turns into a journey of self-discovery for a woman in a polygamous marriage.

programme.title: Mme Wa Rona: Rating: 16, Drama, 2017
programme.desc: A mentally unstable lady allows her jealousy to get the better of her, resulting in unthinkable actions that destroy the lives of everyone around her.

programme.title: Lokshin Bioskop: Nyale: Rating: 13, Drama, 2017

programme.title: Indlalifa: Rating: 13, Drama, 2017
programme.desc: The sudden passing of a family pillar draws the whole family under one roof to investigate the cause of death.

programme.title: Shi Mumbi: Season 4, Episode 16

programme.title: Majimbo: Season 2, Episode 4
programme.desc: 'S2/E4 of 13'. Muzo visits his newly wedded friends and gives them some advice on marriage life. Muzo's advice turns out to be inappropriate and the couple decides that he is not welcome.

programme.title: My Kitchen Party: Season 1, Episode 12

programme.title: Our Perfect Wedding Zambia: Season 1, Episode 1
programme.desc: 'S1/E1'. Our Perfect Wedding is a reality television series that gets up close and personal with twelve very unique couples across Zambia.

programme.title: City On Fire: Season 2, Episode 9
programme.desc: 'S2/E9 of 48'. Tricia spills the beans about her heart break on Facebook and the news lands on the wrong ears. Meanwhile, Bernard and Maria are still public enemy number one.

programme.title: Zed Top Ten: Season 1, Episode 10
programme.desc: 'S1/E10'. ZED Top Ten is a weekly 13 part music series that countdowns Zambia's top ten music videos. Viewers participate by choosing their weekly favourites online.

programme.title: Tuvwange: Season 2, Episode 1
programme.desc: 'S2/E1'. The ladies of Tuvwange kick off season 2 with a bang as they host internationally acclaimed photographer,Chellah Tukuka and fashion guru Harris Nation.

programme.title: Pastor Wants A Wife Zambia: Season 1, Episode 11

programme.title: Clash Of The Choirs SA: Season 4, Episode 8
programme.desc: 'S4/E8'. The choirs face another curve ball this week. Just when they think they've grasped the flow of the show, a surprise twist in the judging process is announced.

programme.title: Imboni Yama Tekisi: Season 1, Episode 8
programme.desc: 'S1/E8'. Nthabiseng makes a difficult decision and fails to give one of her daughters the affirmation she seeks. Sabelo's mother handles his business.

programme.title: Themba: My Inked World: Season 1, Episode 9
programme.desc: 'S1/E9'. Emotions fly high, and tensions rise when Themba is confronted about a pressing issue. Mpho Wabadimo is deflated after a disappointing encounter.

programme.title: Themba: My Inked World: Season 1, Episode 10
programme.desc: 'S1/E10'. It's an intense season finale with the golden couple at crossroads in their relationship. Should they stick it out or call it quits?

programme.title: Sibongile & The Dlaminis: Season 1, Episode 111
programme.desc: 'S1/E111'. Nomalanga finds out that she isn't pregnant, but Gcina makes a devious suggestion to change that. The workers are shocked to see that there is an improvement with Velephi's attitude.

programme.title: News On Wethu: Season 2, Episode 43
programme.desc: 'S2/E43'. The daily news bulletin covering the latest breaking news locally and internationally. Presented in IsiZulu and IsiXhosa, we bring you a new era of current and reliable news coverage.

programme.title: Gomora: Season 3, Episode 143
programme.desc: 'S3/E143'. MaZet learns the shocking truth behind Lulama's death. Miss Biyela asks Sizwe for a peculiar favour. Tshiamo does more digging into Zibuko's shooting.

programme.title: The River: Season 3, Episode 203
programme.desc: 'S3/E203'. Cobra has a surprise that shocks Kedibone and Dimpho. The Dlomos struggle to come to terms with their new normal.

programme.title: Lingashoni: Season 2, Episode 199
programme.desc: 'S2/E199'. Papi confronts Mandla about having an affair with Puleng. There is news about Robert. Sarah takes out her frustrations on a guest that's overstayed their welcome.

programme.title: The Queen: Season 6, Episode 228
programme.desc: 'S6/E228'. The feud between Dorcas and Antoinette is hotting up. Brutus is accused of stealing some of the cocaine before delivering it.

programme.title: Mnakwethu Happily Ever After?: Season 3, Episode 9
programme.desc: 'S3/E9'. Mphahlele's wives have dinner together. Qondanisa and Samantha finally get the DNA test results. MaZwide confronts Qondanisa. Mphahlele has a heart-to-heart with his daughter.

programme.title: The Lucky Star Colab: Season 1, Episode 9
programme.desc: 'S1/E9'. In this double elimination round, the Colabers face the challenge of portraying their hometown experiences. This week, we hear from the stylists and photographers.

programme.title: Big Brother Mzansi: Season 4, Episode 35
programme.desc: 'S4/E35'. As the housemates continue to get to know each other, new layers are revealed. Strategies are also under review, as tensions continue to rise.

programme.title: Sibongile & The Dlaminis: Season 1, Episode 111
programme.desc: 'S1/E111'. Nomalanga finds out that she isn't pregnant, but Gcina makes a devious suggestion to change that. The workers are shocked to see that there is an improvement with Velephi's attitude.

programme.title: Lokshin Bioskop: Nazo: Rating: PG13, Drama, 2014
programme.desc: A beautiful young pickpocketer is forced to embark on a journey of love and redemption after stealing the wallet of a noble and handsome stranger.

programme.title: Inkinga Uben: Rating: 13, Drama, 2017
programme.desc: What began as a mission to stop her husband's wandering eye turns into a journey of self-discovery for a woman in a polygamous marriage.

programme.title: Mme Wa Rona: Rating: 16, Drama, 2017
programme.desc: A mentally unstable lady allows her jealousy to get the better of her, resulting in unthinkable actions that destroy the lives of everyone around her.

programme.title: Lokshin Bioskop: Four-Four...: Rating: 13, Drama, 2015
programme.desc: Starring songstress Mara Louw, this drama about jealousy, greed and murder sees five wives of a wealthy taxi boss in the middle of a bloody battle for his riches.

programme.title: Abangani: Season 1, Episode 2
programme.desc: 'S1/E2 - Definitions'. Linda has moved on with her life after the death of her husband and met a new partner. However, her deceased husband's shady dealings are beginning to surface and are haunting Linda.

programme.title: Conversations With My Brother: Rating: 13, Drama, 2013
programme.desc: Lokshin Bioskop: Conversions With My Brother. Believing his brother died in the war, a man falls in love with his brother's wife.

programme.title: Ingane Ka Baba: Rating: 13, Drama, 2021
programme.desc: A teenage boy tries to prove that his alcoholic father was wrongfully accused of a murder, while also trying to save his parents' marriage.

programme.title: Salamina: Rating: 16, Drama, 2019
programme.desc: A city raised cheeseboy goes back home to his father's village. He thinks their ways are backward and tries to survive using his city ways.

programme.title: Madi Aka: Rating: 13, Drama, 2015
programme.desc: Tumi, a 17-year-old orphan, lost her mother at an early age and has only seen a picture of her father. She starts forming an unexplainable connection with the local bus driver.

programme.title: Amanxeba Ami: Rating: 13, Drama, 2022
programme.desc: When they find themselves accidentally locked inside their family business for the night, a young man and his father finally have an overdue heart-to-heart.

programme.title: Kasi Loving: Rating: 13, Romance, 2022
programme.desc: To raise funds for his LLB, Lerumo works part-time as a gardener for the Mazibukos. He meets Enhle there, and the two begin a relationship, but soon Mr Mazibuko finds out.

programme.title: Ubhuti Wami Lona: Rating: 13, Drama, 2022
programme.desc: Two best friends raised by single parents plot to make their parents fall in love so they can be brothers, but the problem is their parents hate each other's guts.

programme.title: Basebenzi: Rating: PG13, Drama, 2017
programme.desc: When an assertive manager is tasked with turning around the misfortunes of a failing hotel in Soweto, she finds herself embarking on a journey of self-discovery.

programme.title: Basebenzi Part 2: Rating: 13, Drama, 2018
programme.desc: The staff at the hotel are faced with a dilemma: the business is not doing well and they have to convince the owners to keep the hotel running. How will they do it?

programme.title: Izwe Lami Nawe: Rating: 13, Drama, 2017
programme.desc: A young gay man is in love with one of his classmates. However, his father is putting pressure on him to marry a girl from his neighbourhood.

programme.title: Umgcagco Wezinyembezi: Rating: 13, Drama, 2017
programme.desc: When a young girl is forced to marry an older man, her uncle decides to fight back against this cultural practice which forces women into arranged marriages.

programme.title: Umsesane: Rating: 13, Drama, 2021
programme.desc: Zitha and Thando stumble upon a magical ring. They've been living paycheck to paycheck and their supernatural ring might be their ticket out of poverty and suffering.

programme.title: Umoni Wothando: Rating: 13, Drama, 2021
programme.desc: Nobuhle gets engaged and her two sisters come together to help plan her wedding. Things take a sour turn when one of them becomes jealous and sabotages the wedding preparations.

programme.title: Ay'phakelwa: Rating: 13, Drama, 2021
programme.desc: Two lovers from different backgrounds fall in love, but their families will do everything in their power to keep them apart.

programme.title: Boikanyo: Rating: 13, Drama, 2022
programme.desc: Spoiled thirty-year-old Boikanyo has spent his entire life living off his father's fortune. He gets a reality check when he has to complete his Matric to inherit his father's empire.

programme.title: Isinqumo: Rating: 13, Drama, 2017
programme.desc: The son of a failed soccer star is on the verge of getting a scholarship that could change their lives. However, his father's desperation threatens to cut his dreams short.

programme.title: Soka Lami: Rating: PG13, Drama, 2017
programme.desc: A couple's upcoming wedding unleashes cultural prejudices when the bride's family objects to their daughter marrying a foreign national.

programme.title: Icala Lika Thembi: Rating: 16, Drama, 2017
programme.desc: A young mother suffering from postpartum depression is jailed and goes to trial for killing her baby. Did she or did she not commit the crime?

programme.title: Cursed: Rating: PG13, Comedy, 2014
programme.desc: A young man is cursed after stealing money from the revered and feared local inyanga. He knows he has to take it back, but the problem is he doesn't know how.
